# AppExtensionProcess.Configuration

**Structure**

A structure that holds the identity of an app extension and process-related details.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Overview

This type manages the configuration details you use to create an [doc://com.apple.extensionfoundation/documentation/ExtensionFoundation/AppExtensionProcess] structure. Create an instance of this type and initialize it with the identity of the app extension you want and a closure to run if the app extension terminates unexpectedly.

## Creating the configuration structure

- **init(appExtensionIdentity:onInterruption:)**

## Responding to process interruptions

- **onInterruption**: The closure to run if the app extension’s process exits unexpectedly.

## Getting the app-extension details

- **appExtensionIdentity**: The identifying information for the app extension you want to launch.

## Creating the app-extension process

- **init(configuration:)**: Finds an existing process for the specified app extension or creates a new one synchronously.
- **init(configuration:)**: Finds an existing process for the specified app extension or creates a new one asynchronously.
